text: Total RNA was extracted from infected or mock-infected cells using TRIzol reagent. Denatured RNA was separated on 1% denaturing agarose-formaldehyde gels and transferred onto a nylon membrane (Roche Applied Science, Indianapolis, IN). Northern blot analysis was performed as described previously with strand-specific RNA probes to detect RVFV anti-sense Ssegment/N mRNA, mouse IFN-b mRNA, or mouse ISG56 mRNA [57] .
